message:
Unneeded mutual recursion detected in these type declarations. It's recommended to rewrite 'type_decl' as follows:
type type_decl = (decl_name * (decl_name * decl_type) list)[@@deriving
                                                             (eq,
                                                               (show
                                                                  {
                                                                    with_path
                                                                    = false
                                                                  }))]
